articles.description: England captain Harry Kane says the 2026 Fifa World Cup may not be his last international tournament.
articles.title: Harry Kane: England captain looks to play on for country beyond 2026 World Cup

articles.description: Tottenham's Rodrigo Bentancur is banned for seven games and fined £100,000 for using a racial slur about team-mate Son Heung-min.
articles.title: Rodrigo Bentancur: Tottenham midfielder banned for seven matches over racial slur about Son Heung-min

articles.description: The Kansas City Chiefs lose their first game of the season at the Buffalo Bills while the Pittsburgh Steelers beat arch rivals the Baltimore Ravens and the Detroit Lions hit a half century.
articles.title: NFL Results & Week 11 recap: Bills end Chiefs run, Steelers beat Ravens & Lions run riot

articles.description: The Cleveland Cavaliers beat the Charlotte Hornets 128-114 to stretch their lead at the top of the NBA Eastern Conference.
articles.title: Cleveland Cavaliers 128-114 Charlotte Hornets: Cavaliers go 15-0

articles.description: Retiring superstar Rafael Nadal says he will not be distracted by emotion as Spain look to win the Davis Cup in the final tournament of his career.
articles.title: Rafael Nadal focused on Spain success in Davis Cup farewell

articles.description: Chelsea striker Sam Kerr and West Ham midfielder Kristie Mewis are expecting a baby next year.
articles.title: Sam Kerr & Kristie Mewis expecting baby in 2025

articles.description: Brendon McCullum will take over the England white-ball teams in the new year but what are the key issues he faces in the job?
articles.title: Brendon McCullum: Key issues for England white-ball coach including Buttler, Stokes, Bethell and Champions Trophy

articles.description: Marcus Stoinis hits an unbeaten 61 off 27 balls as Australia thrash Pakistan by seven wickets to seal a 3-0 victory in the T20 series.
articles.title: Australia v Pakistan: Marcus Stoinis shines as hosts win T20 series 3-0

articles.description: The Canadian Grand Prix to be held in late May rather than early June from 2026 as part of Formula 1's attempts to reduce carbon emissions.
articles.title: Canadian Grand Prix moved to late May as part of F1 sustainability push

articles.description: Adrien Rabiot scores two headers as France beat Italy at the San Siro to overtake the Azzurri and win Nations League Group A2.
articles.title: Nations League: Adrien Rabiot double seals top spot for France as they beat Italy
